definition: expletives used informally as intensifiers, a reproach for some lapse or misdeed, to attribute responsibility to
details:
adjective
- expletives used informally as intensifiers
= synonyms: damn
noun
- a reproach for some lapse or misdeed
= example: a reproach for some lapse or misdeed
= synonyms: rap
- an accusation that you are responsible for some lapse or misdeed
= synonyms: incrimination, inculpation
verb
- to attribute responsibility to
= example: to attribute responsibility to
= synonyms: charge
- to put or pin the blame on
= example: to put or pin the blame on
= synonyms: fault
